thread.title: SRK to spend 'quiet' 50th birthday

title: SRK to spend 'quiet' 50th birthday
text: SRK to spend 'quiet' 50th birthday Sunday, 25 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Hyderabad, Oct 25 : A 50th birthday usually calls for a huge celebration, but superstar Shah Rukh Khan, who will touch the half century mark on November 2, says he has plans for a "quiet" special day with his family.
